title: [Large-scale] Discussion-Based Learning Design to Strengthen Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical knowledge and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Process for current practitioners to explore controversial topics using digital devices, emphasizing teamwork and practical application skills in a project-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners improve pharmaceutical knowledge related to discussion topics by at least 30%
Learners enhance critical thinking and communication skills by 25% through structured discussions
Through team collaboration, learners generate at least three practical solutions applicable to patient case analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
